entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023
